dct_description_sm: Relief shown by gradient tints and spot heights. Depth shown by bathymetric tints. Inset: continuation of Arabian Peninsula. Shows "Main Motor Routes, Secondary Routes, Caravan Routes and Tracks, Railways, Oil Pipe Lines and Sand Deserts." In lower left corner: "923." In lower right corner: vendor's sticker: Hammond Maps, C.S. Hammond and Co. New York.
